iliza: Ukuphazamiseka kokuhambisa amandla ngaphandle kokuthutha izinto
rhoqo: Inani lemijikelo yamaza edlula inqaku ngexesha elinikiweyo
ubude bamaza: Umgama phakathi kweendawo ezimbini ezihambelanayo zamaza
ubukhulu: Ubuninzi bokushenxiswa kwendawo ukusuka kumyinge wamaza
i-electromagnetic spectrum: Uluhlu lwazo zonke ii-frequencies ze-electromagnetic wave
I-Voltage: Umahluko onokubakho phakathi kwamanqaku amabini kwisekethe
i-electroscope: Isixhobo sokubona ubukho kunye nomqondiso wentlawulo yombane
isiphaluka: Indlela evaliweyo evumela umsinga wombane ukuba uhambe
uthotho: Isekethe enawo onke amacandelo adityaniswe kwilophu enye
ohm umthetho: Ubudlelwane phakathi kombane, okwangoku, kunye nokumelana (V = IR)
ilensi: Izinto ezibonakalayo ezinokuthi zigxile okanye ziphambukise imitha yokukhanya
ukucinga: Ukubuyela emva kokukhanya, isandi, okanye amanye amaza ukusuka phezulu
ukuchaswa: Ukugotywa kokukhanya njengoko kudlula ukusuka kwenye indawo ukuya kwenye
optics: Isebe lefiziksi elifunda ukukhanya kunye neempawu zalo
